1.text: Passive: Periodically, Dr. Mundo gains immunity to the  immobilizing effects of the next hostile spell to affect him. Upon resisting one, Dr. Mundo pays a health cost equal to 4% of his current health and propels a canister that lands 525 units in the general direction of its source, remaining on the ground for 7 seconds.
1.html: Passive: Periodically, Dr. Mundo gains immunity to the immobilizing effects of the next hostile spell to affect him. Upon resisting one, Dr. Mundo pays a health cost equal to 4% of his current health and propels a canister that lands 525 units in the general direction of its source, remaining on the ground for 7 seconds.
markedPassages: immobilizing

2.text: Dr. Mundo can move near the canister to consume it,  healing himself for 4% of his maximum health and reducing the  cooldown of Goes Where He Pleases by 15 seconds. Enemy  champions can move near it to destroy it.
2.html: Dr. Mundo can move near the canister to consume it, healing himself for 4% of his maximum health and reducing the  cooldown of Goes Where He Pleases by 15 seconds. Enemy champions can move near it to destroy it.
markedPassages: healing
cooldown
champions

3.text: Goes Where He Pleases'  cooldown resets upon respawning.
3.html: Goes Where He Pleases' cooldown resets upon respawning.

0.text: Active: Dr. Mundo throws an infected bonesaw in the target direction that deals magic damage to the first enemy hit and  slows them by 40% for 2 seconds.
0.html: Active: Dr. Mundo throws an infected bonesaw in the target direction that deals magic damage to the first enemy hit and slows them by 40% for 2 seconds.
markedPassages: slows

1.text: Infected Bonesaw has a minimum damage threshold, and is capped against  monsters.
1.html: Infected Bonesaw has a minimum damage threshold, and is capped against monsters.
markedPassages: monsters

2.text: If the bonesaw hits an enemy, Dr. Mundo  heals for 50% of the health cost, increased to 100% against  champions or  monsters.
2.html: If the bonesaw hits an enemy, Dr. Mundo heals for 50% of the health cost, increased to 100% against champions or monsters.
markedPassages: heals
champions
monsters

0.text: Active: Dr. Mundo charges up a defibrillator for up to 3 seconds, dealing magic damage every 0.25 seconds to nearby enemies and storing 80% − 95% (based on level) of post-mitigation damage he takes as grey health on his health bar, reduced to 25% after the first 0.75 seconds.
0.html: Active: Dr. Mundo charges up a defibrillator for up to 3 seconds, dealing magic damage every 0.25 seconds to nearby enemies and storing 80% − 95% (based on level) of post-mitigation damage he takes as grey health on his health bar, reduced to 25% after the first 0.75 seconds.

1.text: Heart Zapper can be recast after 1 second within the duration, and does so automatically after the duration.
1.html: Heart Zapper can be recast after 1 second within the duration, and does so automatically after the duration.

2.text: Recast: Dr. Mundo detonates the defibrillator, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies and  healing for 50% of grey health, increased to 100% if at least one enemy champion or large monster is hit.
2.html: Recast: Dr. Mundo detonates the defibrillator, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies and healing for 50% of grey health, increased to 100% if at least one enemy champion or large monster is hit.
markedPassages: healing

0.text: Passive: Dr. Mundo gains  bonus attack damage.
0.html: Passive: Dr. Mundo gains  bonus attack damage.
markedPassages: bonus attack damage

1.text: Active: Dr. Mundo empowers his next basic attack within 4 seconds to have an  uncancellable windup, gain  50 bonus range, and deal bonus physical damage, increased by 0% − 60% (based on missing health). If the target dies or is a small monster, they are sent flying away in a line, though not through terrain, causing all enemies they pass through to take 100% AD plus Blunt Force Trauma's minimum bonus damage.
1.html: Active: Dr. Mundo empowers his next basic attack within 4 seconds to have an uncancellable windup, gain  50 bonus range, and deal bonus physical damage, increased by 0% − 60% (based on missing health). If the target dies or is a small monster, they are sent flying away in a line, though not through terrain, causing all enemies they pass through to take 100% AD plus Blunt Force Trauma's minimum bonus damage.
markedPassages: uncancellable windup
50 bonus range

2.text: Blunt Force Trauma as well as the triggering attack's damage is increased to 140% against  minions and 150% against  monsters.
2.html: Blunt Force Trauma as well as the triggering attack's damage is increased to 140% against minions and 150% against monsters.
markedPassages: minions
monsters

3.text: Blunt Force Trauma  resets Dr. Mundo's basic attack timer.
3.html: Blunt Force Trauma resets Dr. Mundo's basic attack timer.
markedPassages: resets
possibleConcerningAbilities: Blunt Force Trauma  resets Dr. Mundo's basic attack timer.

0.text: Active: Dr. Mundo injects himself with chemicals to become enhanced for 10 seconds, gaining increased  base health,  bonus movement speed, and  bonus health regeneration.
0.html: Active: Dr. Mundo injects himself with chemicals to become enhanced for 10 seconds, gaining increased  base health,  bonus movement speed, and  bonus health regeneration.
markedPassages: base health
bonus movement speed
bonus health regeneration

1.text: At rank 3, Maximum Dosage's increased base health and bonus health regeneration are both increased by 5% for each enemy  champion within 1200 units at the time of cast.
1.html: At rank 3, Maximum Dosage's increased base health and bonus health regeneration are both increased by 5% for each enemy champion within 1200 units at the time of cast.
markedPassages: champion
